title: Lower queue priority
body: i had a very bad lag yesterday (5000ms) i could barely move and it was so glitchy and annoying i tried to leave then get back but same thing so i really had to leave and now i'm placed in lower queue priority i have to wait 20 mins for each match, means 100 mins just cuz of lag and getting disconnected.. not fair :(

replies.body: The escalated timer on the lower priority queue would only occur after multiple leaves.  The only way to return to good standing with [Leaverbuster ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ)is by playing consistently without interruptions.  If your network is experiencing constant connection issues, I recommend checking out our [troubleshooting connection](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to get this fixed up.  Let me know if you have any questions!

Ive gotten low priority queue twice in my life the first time i had 10, 5 minute waits then the other i had 5, 20 minute waits. When i see other people get LPQ i only ever have seen the 5, 20 minute waits, Whatever happened to the shorter ones, were they removed?

The LPQ timer is based off an account's trend, or history, of leaves.  It will start with the lowest amount unless you are frequently leaving, in which case the timer will continue to escalate.  It's necessary to continue playing without interruptions in order to return to a good standing with leaverbuster.  I hope that helps clear some things up, but let me know!
